entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
